preclusion: MLE4210 Materials for Energy Storage and Conversion
description:
The module provides a foundation for students interested
in doing research into materials related to energy storage
and conversion. It will start by introducing the basics of
designing and processing materials for energy storage
and conversion, their integration into batteries,
supercapacitors, and fuel cells as well as methods for the
performance characterisation and optimisation of these
devices. The module will finish with aspects of current
research on materials for energy storage and conversion.
title: Energy Conversion & Storage
